svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Various sources of merchandise trade as a share of GDP, United States
Figure corresponds to various data sources detailing the total value of exports as a share of the country's GDP. See
the Source tab for further details on each data series.
Source: CEPII Two Centuries of Bilateral Trade and Gravity Data
